snippet: Officials have given final approval to an ordinance that makes Los Angeles the largest city in the United States to raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour.
abstract: Los Angeles City Council gives final approval to raising city's minimum wage to $15 an hour, clearing way for Mayor Eric Garcetti's signature.
lead_paragraph: Officials have given final approval to an ordinance that makes Los Angeles the largest city in the United States to raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour.

headline.main: California: Raise in Minimum Wage in Los Angeles Is to Be Signed Saturday
headline.print_headline: California: Raise in Minimum Wage in Los Angeles Is to Be Signed Saturday
